q: '' Former soccer stud leads the Pack On Frank Zombo 's first play in an NFL game, he sacked Michael Vick . He was a dream team all-stater at Stevenson but rarely played defense. . The Brit comic caused uproar at the bash, leaving hordes of Hollywood's biggest names seething after a barrage of abuse. He mocked Robert Downey Jr. JR's drink and drugs past, saying: Many of you in this room probably know him best from such facilities as the Betty Ford Clinic and Los Angeles County Jail. He also joked that the titles of Robert De Niro 's past films sounded like pornos. But, as Donald Rumsfeld writes, he's never much of a handwringer, I don't spend a lot of time in recriminations, looking back or second-guessing decisions made in real time with imperfect information by myself or others. As seems typical of so much here, that's partially true; the author has no taste for self-criticism or second-guessing himself. Sunday, Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R-Ky.) told host David Letterman Gregory that he did not`` have much to add'' to what Hillary Clinton had said on how the administration was handling the uprising. I don't have any criticism of Barack Obama or Secretary Hillary Clinton at this point, Mitch McConnell added after he was pressed by Gregory.`` I mean, they know full well that we can't give the Egyptians advice about who their leadership is.
